title: PILGRIMAGE ARTWORK
intro: The majority of the artwork shown below was used in a single, animated section of Pilgrimage called "Obstacles and Opportunity;" the curious can find it in the Video section of this site.  Most of these images were created in a simple paint program (Seashore, for Mac) before I learned how to do vector graphics.  Some of the later ones have been vectorized from old .jpgs.
blurbs: Early attempts at outlining, based off of still frames of low-res video footage.
Refining the technique.  Tic tacs are particularly difficult to catch at a photogenic moment.
